## CodegenOptions.mode property

- `module` mode will generate ES module import statements for helpers and export the render function as the default export. - `function` mode will generate a single `const { helpers... } = Vue` statement and return the render function. It expects `Vue` to be globally available (or passed by wrapping the code with an IIFE). It is meant to be used with `new Function(code)()` to generate a render function at runtime.  'function'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mode?: 'module' | 'function';
```
